Title: Authorizes equitable tip pooling structures for counter service restaurants that pay all employees at or above minimum wage
Summary: Authorizes equitable tip pooling structures for counter service restaurants that pay all employees at or above minimum wage; authorizes tip pooling for service and non-service employees.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to authorizing equitable tip pooling structures for counter service restaurants that pay all employees at or above minimum wage
